passiveDescription.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>10%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>40</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>12.5%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>50</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>15%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>60</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>17.5%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>70</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>80</cryo>.
